AppUser.title: AppUser
AppUser.description: Represents a user of the River Business application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Auth UID).

totalConsumptionLiters.description: Total water consumed in liters. Represents the user's current inventory.

assignedWaterStationId.description: ID of the assigned water station.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user was created.

onboardingComplete.description: Flag indicating if user has completed onboarding.

customPlanDetails.description: Details of the user's custom plan.

currentContractUrl.description: URL to the user's latest contract document.

photoURL.description: URL to the user's profile photo.

contractUploadedDate.description: Timestamp of when the contract was uploaded.

pendingPlan.description: Details of a pending plan change.

planChangeEffectiveDate.description: The date when the pending plan change will take effect.

lastChatMessage.description: The last message sent in the chat.

lastChatTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the last chat message.

hasUnreadAdminMessages.description: True if the user has unread messages from an admin.

hasUnreadUserMessages.description: True if the admin has unread messages from the user.

supportDisplayName.description: Public display name for the support agent in chat.

supportDescription.description: Public description for the support agent (e.g., 'Customer Support').

supportPhotoURL.description: URL to the public support agent's profile photo.

UnclaimedProfile.title: UnclaimedProfile
UnclaimedProfile.description: Represents a pre-configured user profile created by an admin, waiting to be claimed by a new user. The document ID is the clientId.

clientId.description: Manually assigned client identifier. This is the primary key.

assignedWaterStationId.description: ID of the assigned water station.

adminCreatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the admin created this profile.

customPlanDetails.description: Details of the user's custom plan.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a chat conversation.

text.description: The text content of the message. Optional if there is an attachment.

partnershipAgreementUrl.description: URL to the signed partnership agreement.

id.description: Unique identifier for the delivery, can be used as a tracking number.

userId.description: ID of the user receiving the delivery.

volumeContainers.description: Volume of water delivered in containers. This is used for deduction.

proofOfDeliveryUrl.description: URL to the proof of delivery image.

adminNotes.description: Notes from the admin about the delivery.

rejectionReason.description: Reason provided by admin for rejecting a payment.

ComplianceReport.title: ComplianceReport
ComplianceReport.description: Represents a water quality compliance report.

name.description: Name of the report (e.g., 'DOH Bacteriological Test - June 2024').

resultId.description: The official result ID number from the testing body.

results.description: Admin-entered notes or results of the inspection.

SanitationChecklistItem.title: SanitationChecklistItem
SanitationChecklistItem.description: Represents a single item in a sanitation checklist.

item.description: The text of the checklist item.

checked.description: Whether the item has been checked off.

remarks.description: Optional remarks for the checklist item.

DispenserReport.title: DispenserReport
DispenserReport.description: Represents the full sanitation report for a single dispenser.

dispenserId.description: Unique ID for this dispenser report instance.

dispenserName.description: The admin-assigned name for the dispenser (e.g., 'Lobby Unit').

SanitationVisit.title: SanitationVisit
SanitationVisit.description: Represents a sanitation visit record for a client's office.

userId.description: ID of the user whose office is being visited.

reportUrl.description: URL to a potential summary sanitation report attachment.

shareableLink.description: A public, shareable link to the report.

officerSignature.description: Data URI of the officer's signature.

clientSignature.description: Data URI of the client's signature.

dispenserReports.description: An array of reports, one for each dispenser inspected during the visit.

PublicSanitationLink.title: PublicSanitationLink
PublicSanitationLink.description: Maps a unique, unguessable ID to a sanitation visit for public access.

ConsumptionHistory.title: ConsumptionHistory
ConsumptionHistory.description: Represents a single water consumption entry for a user.

RefillRequest.title: RefillRequest
RefillRequest.description: Represents a user's request for a one-time water refill.

id.description: Unique identifier for the refill request.

userId.description: ID of the user requesting the refill.

requestedAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was made.

status.description: The current status of the refill request.

volumeContainers.description: The number of containers requested for the refill.

requestedDate.description: The specific date the user requested the delivery for.

data.description: Optional data related to the notification.

/users/{userId}/deliveries/{deliveryId}.description: Subcollection for a user's delivery records.

/users/{userId}/payments/{paymentId}.description: Subcollection for a user's payment history.

/users/{userId}/consumptionHistory/{hist.description: Subcollection for a user's consumption history.

/users/{userId}/sanitationVisits/{visitI.description: Subcollection for a client's scheduled office sanitation visits.

/users/{userId}/refillRequests/{requestI.description: Subcollection for user's one-time refill requests.

/users/{userId}/chatMessages/{messageId}.description: Subcollection for a user's live chat messages.

/waterStations/{stationId}.description: Top-level collection for all water stations.

/waterStations/{stationId}/complianceRep.description: Subcollection for a station's compliance reports.

/schedules/currentSchedule.description: A single document to hold the current global delivery schedule.

/unclaimedProfiles/{clientId}.description: Stores pre-configured profiles created by an admin, waiting to be claimed. The document ID is the clientId.

/publicSanitationLinks/{linkId}.description: Stores mappings for public sanitation report links.
